import { HttpClient } from '@angular/common/http'; import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-about', templateUrl: './about.component.html', styleUrls: ['./about.component.css'] }) export class AboutComponent implements OnInit { data:any; URL:string='/assets/static/about.json' url: string = '/assets/static/aboutdata.json'; constructor(private http: HttpClient) { } ngOnInit() { this.http.get(this.url).subscribe(res => { this.data = res; console.log(this.data); }); } }
